title: Whole Foods Capitalism
sub_head: Believe it or not, a CEO steps up to defend free markets.
body:
Bernie Sanders may have made socialism mainstream, but John Mackey isn’t buying. Recently the Whole Foods CEO characterized socialism as “trickle up poverty”—while defending capitalism as the “greatest thing humanity’s ever done.”
Mr. Mackey offered his remarks while promoting his latest book, “Conscious Leadership.” The title points to the strategies he pursued in building Whole Foods.
